column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The steak tartare with the egg and toast is amazing! Best I've ever had. I was not a big fan of the bone in ribeye however
column2: I loved the sides; mashed potatoes and the mushrooms were nice. Wedge salad was OK but the thick cut bacon was amazing. The vibe there is really great
column3: the staff is nice and the music is awesome
column4: heard some 90's hip-hop. Upstairs has a super cool bar and seating but downstairs is a hidden gem. Vintage lighting and artifacts Â throughout the restaurant. The dim lighting and glass chandeliers are nice upstairs! I will definitely be going back and want to try the fillet next but I'm trying to eat steak only once a month. High cholesterol problems! Great night at Bavettes
